message: Let's split it fairly.  I'll take 60, you take 40.  Seems like a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too favorable towards you. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? This accounts for the time value of money, as it'll be worth less if we wait longer.
Let's be reasonable. It's clear we're both stubborn, so a 50/50 split seems like the fairest way to end this. No more time to waste on negotiation.
